clinical_study.brief_title: Bendamustine Hydrochloride Injection for Previously Untreated Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Bendamustine Hydrochloride Injection in Previously Untreated Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether bendamustine is effective in the treatment of initial treatment of Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL).

arm_group.description: d1-d2,i.v.gtt, 100mg/m2/d, 28 days per cycle, at most 6 cycles.
d1-d2, d15-d16, p.o., 0.4mg/kg/day, 28 days per cycle, at most 6 cycles(if WBC≥4×109 /L at d12-d14 ); d1-d2, p.o., 0.4mg/kg/day, 28 days per cycle, at most 6 cycles(if WBC＜4×109 /L at d12-d14 );
